text: is an Japanese pop singer-songwriter and actor. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Girl (1986) * Radio (1986) * Birds (1987) * Dear (1988) * Realize (1989) * Justice (1990) * Revolution (1991) * Nostalgia (1993) * Taiyō no Shōnen (1995) * Bless (1997) * Honesto (1999) * Remind (2000) * Ai wo Kudasai (2003) * My Life (2004) * We All (2009) * Statement (2013) * Baton (2017) * Love Person (2021) ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:J-pop singers Category:Japanese singer-songwriters
